q_ch: 未完成的订单中，哪个订单完成的进度最快？
q_en: Which order has the fastest completion progress among the unfinished orders?
gt:
Hey there! 😄 Based on the latest data, the order with the fastest completion progress among the unfinished ones is **PolyU_Skirt**. Here's a quick look at the details:

| Order ID | Order Name  | Completion Progress |
|----------|-------------|---------------------|
| 9        | PolyU_Skirt | 100%                |

Looks like PolyU_Skirt is all set to be completed soon! 🎉 If you have any more questions, feel free to ask!

steps.sql: SELECT o.id, o.order_name FROM orders o JOIN order_product op ON o.id = op.order_id JOIN sewing_tasks st ON op.id = st.order_product_id WHERE st.status != 2 GROUP BY o.id;
steps.description: Retrieve the IDs and names of all unfinished orders

steps.sql: SELECT o.id, o.order_name, SUM(st.completed_number) / SUM(op.number) AS progress FROM orders o JOIN order_product op ON o.id = op.order_id JOIN sewing_tasks st ON op.id = st.order_product_id WHERE st.status != 2 GROUP BY o.id ORDER BY progress DESC LIMIT 1;
steps.description: Calculate the completion progress for each unfinished order
